title: ScapeGPT
text: Mobile app developed in late 2023 using Unity 3D and Google Cardboard, featuring a virtual reality escape room where the player can communicate with ChatGPT via voice commands to receive help.

title: EATI Pexels
text: Mobile app developed in 2023 using Kotlin. The project utilized Jetpack Compose to create a layout for searching and displaying images related to user-input concepts, which were retrieved through an API.

title: Selenium Webdriver Testing
text: Developed in 2021 using Java and Selenium Webdriver, consists of various tests applied to the Sauce Demo webpage (https://www.saucedemo.com/).

title: Vacunacion C4
text: This web application, developed by a four-member team in 2021 using Laravel and Node.js, was designed to manage vaccination records and stock levels across various locations in Argentina.

title: Tomalan
text: Mobile app developed in 2020 as the final project for the 'Tecnología de Programación' course, designed as a game for pre-drinking gatherings with friends.

title: Parkimeter Management App
text: Java-based application developed in 2020 that allows users to manage a database of parkimeters through a basic GUI. The application enables users to perform various actions related to car parking management.
